text:
February
Twenty-first
19 4 0
Mr. M. 3. Novik
Radio Station WYNC
Munioipal Broadoasting System
New York City
Dear Novik:
For gosh sakes, I wouldn’t have for the world
bothered you in Nassau. However, I am
returning herewith the amended oopy of the
contract which RCA purposes that we accept.
Regarding Columbia, I do not know what to
suggest. I presume you refer to the Columbia
Broadcasting System and not Columbia University.
If it is CB3, why not find out what they have
in mind and let them make the proposal.
The A3CAP business isn’t rushing and we can
wait until Mr. Buck returns.
Yes, I got your notice on the American Musio
Festival. Thanks a lot.
Cordially,
FE 3/rep
Enclosure
Frank E. Sohooley
